name: SubscriptionsR5Backport
title: Subscriptions R5 Backport
description: The Subscription R5 Backport Implementation Guide enables servers running verions of FHIR earlier than R5 to implement a subset of R5 Subscriptions in a standardized way.

resource.name: Backported R5 Subscription Bundle Event Count
resource.description: Represents the number of event notifications conveyed by this Bundle.

resource.name: Backport R5 Subscription Heartbeat Period
resource.description: Interval in seconds to send 'heartbeat' notifications.

resource.name: Backported R5 Subscription Notification Type
resource.description: The type of event being conveyed with this notificaiton.

resource.name: Backport R5 Subscription Payload Content Information
resource.description: How much of the resource content to deliver in the notification payload. The choices are an empty payload, only the resource id, or the full resource content.

resource.name: Backported R5 Subscription Event Count
resource.description: Indicates the number of unique events that have triggered notification attempts on this Subscription inclusive of the current notification being sent.

resource.name: Backported R5 Canonical SubscriptionTopic
resource.description: The Canonical SubscriptionTopic resource relevant to this notification (e.g., the topic the triggering subscription relates to).

resource.name: Backported R5 Subscription Absolute URL
resource.description: The Subscription resource that triggered this notification, as an absolute URL for the Subscription resource on the server that generated the notification.

resource.name: Backport R5 Subscription Timeout
resource.description: Timeout in seconds to attempt notification delivery.

resource.name: Backport R5 Subscription Topic Canonical
resource.description: Canonical reference to the subscription topic being subscribed to.

resource.name: Backported R5 Subscription Content Value Set
resource.description: Codes to represent how much resource content to send in the notification payload.

resource.name: Backported R5 Subscription Notification Type Value Set
resource.description: Codes to represent types of notification bundles.

resource.name: Backported R5 Subscription Content Code System
resource.description: Codes to represent how much resource content to send in the notification payload.

resource.name: Backported R5 Subscription Notification Type Code System
resource.description: Codes to represent types of notification bundles.
